channel.title: ati graphics Tweak,
channel.description:
Hello all. I want to know where i can find. HL2.exe in Black mesa source, Reason is i just want to Tweak Graphics with a programe, called RadeonPro,. In Game setting, it seemse not working well. exemple, Anisotropic filtering, Enyone know where and how to use it,
Greatings :wink:

item.title: ati graphics Tweak,
item.dc:creator: darkempire
item.description:
Oke Thanks for help.

Here are Result that it work
Much beter than In-game Settings lol

if you want to see Diffrends,
Cheak my screenshot,

Override version:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=110076007

item.title: ati graphics Tweak,
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
AFAIK BM, like every other source 2007 SDK mods, uses the hl2.exe that’s inside your Source SDK 2007 folder:

…\Steam\steamapps[youraccount]\source sdk base 2007\hl2.exe

Read full topic
